name: Shoot Your Shot
description:
Shoot Your Shot is a throwing mini game where you need to throw lemon slices in cocktails glass.

Throw slices to score points, every scored slice give you the opportunity to throw a green lemon slice which give more points.

Controls : just swipe to throw lemon slice.

Credits :

Océane Pimpit : Artist (3D/UI)

Vincent Pettineo : Programmer (Gameplay/PostProcess)
